name: function-web-components
description: A library to write Web Components as a single function
author: Jan Kuehle <jkuehle90@gmail.com>

scripts.start: yarn concurrently -n HTTP,TSC "yarn browser-sync start -c browser-sync-config.js" "tsc --outDir dist --watch"
scripts.release: yarn compile && cross-var "git commit -am v$npm_package_version" && cross-var "git tag v$npm_package_version" && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
